title: Perfect!
text: I booked through Quickbook.com...same day and got a wonderful $159 rate for a queen room. My husband and I had a wonderful time at this hotel. Pleasantly surprised! The location is wonderful...close to Central Park and Times Square. The staff was so helpful. Now about the room...very modern and nicely appointed! I slept like a baby in the bed. For NYC...wonderful deal...especially for a holiday weekend!
